vlive.korean: "위대한 쇼맨"도 정말 좋은 영화였어요. "The Greatest Showman" is a really good movie, too. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 63
vlive.english: "The Greatest Showman" is a really good movie, too.

vlive.korean: 아까... - 학생인데 아까 위대한 마술사분 아니신가? Aren't you... - You're a student. Aren't you the great magician? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: Aren't you... - You're a student. Aren't you the great magician?

vlive.korean: '위대한 쇼맨' 진짜 꼭 보라고요? Oh, you recommend The Greatest Showman? 듣기 View video TWICE : 나모사
vlive.english: Oh, you recommend The Greatest Showman?

vlive.korean: 위대한 개츠비 같나요 약간? Do I look like Gatsby? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : IZ X Rooftop Live - 아이즈의 루프탑라이브!
총각, '위대한 쇼' 얼마나 위대한가? - '위대한 쇼'요? How "great" is "The Great Show?" - "The Great Show?" 듣기 View video VIXX : 택운이 빼고 동생들이 다했다ㅠㅠ.(오랜만에 빅스 외식) 🤔
vlive.english: How "great" is "The Great Show?" - "The Great Show?"

examples.korean: one of the greatest triumphs of modern science 발음듣기 현대 과학의 가장 위대한 업적 중 하나 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: one of the greatest triumphs of modern science 발음

examples.korean: He was one of boxing’s all-time greats. 발음듣기 그는 권투 사상 위대한 선수들 중의 한 명이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was one of boxing’s all-time greats. 발음

examples.korean: She is on my shortlist of great singers. 발음듣기 그녀는 내가 뽑은 가장 위대한 가수 명단에 들어간다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is on my shortlist of great singers. 발음

examples.korean: one of the greatest practitioners of science fiction 발음듣기 가장 위대한 현역 공상 과학 소설 작가들 중 한 사람 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: one of the greatest practitioners of science fiction 발음

examples.korean: ‘Swan Lake’ is one of the great classical ballets. 발음듣기 ‘백조의 호수’는 위대한 고전 발레의 하나이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Swan Lake’ is one of the great classical ballets. 발음
